title: Provided that, if levelling of land and construction/erection of the compound wall / fencing as per Clause (b) below to the land under surrender is not desirable considering the total area of reservation, the quantum of TDR shall be reduced to 1 : 1
clause_text: Provided that, if levelling of land and construction/erection of the compound wall / fencing as per Clause (b) below to the land under surrender is not desirable considering the total area of reservation, the quantum of TDR shall be reduced to 1 : 1.85 and 1 : 2.85 in non- congested area and congested area respectively. In such cases, the owner shall have also an option of paying the cost of construction of compound wall (as decided by the Authority) without reducing the quantum of TDR.
section: Generation of the Transferable Development Rights (TDR)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
